Posts.Content: Aug 1, 2011 01:45PM Sunshine9504 wrote: well tomorrows the day for the biopsy, and i have been soo nervous....i read stuff on the internet and it makes things worse sometime because then i start looking for things that i might have missed... Like the veins on my left breast are very visable while the ones on the right not as much. and the areola is larger on the left side and kinda oval and not round like the one on the right..... these are the things that are making me crazy right now. are those things i should have noticed before? are they of concern now?.........will i have any indication when i go have this done tomorrow if something is wrong or doesnt look right?
Posts.Title: Biopsy Sunshine9504 Sunshine9504
